xxl.core.indexStructures
Class BTree.Node

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree.Node
      xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree.Node
          xxl.core.indexStructures.BTree.Node
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultiDiskBTree.Node
Enclosing class:
BTree
public class BTree.Node
extends ORTree.Node

Node is the class used to represent leaf- and non-leaf nodes of BTree. Nodes are stored in containers.

See Also:
Tree.Node, ORTree.Node

Inserts data into the current node. If level>0 data must be an index entry.

split

protected Tree.Node.SplitInfo split(java.util.Stack path)
Description copied from class: ORTree.Node
Splits the current node. A new node is created, but no handle is reserved for this node in its container (i.e. container.insert() or container.reserve() are not called at this stage). This means that no index entry for this node is passed to its parent-node.

Specified by:
split in class ORTree.Node
Parameters:
path - the nodes already visited during this insert
Returns:
a SplitInfo containig all information needed about the split
